creator: leamanp@synergy-fs.com
text:
Am I right in thinking that the page-height="indefinite" or page-
width="indefinite" properties on simple-page-master are not yet implemented?

All the examples that I have seen seem to concentrate on fixed-size documents. 
I'm looking for a way to produce a variable length document for presentation on 
the screen.

creator: jeremias@apache.org
text:
Yes, this has not been implemented, yet. Any help implementing the feature 
within our redesign effort is highly welcome.

creator: pascal.sancho@takoma.fr
text:
FOP compliance page should mention this
IMHO, replacement value should not equal to 0 (cause a Exception in thread
"AWT-EventQueue-0") -- I prefer the xconf value

update compliance documentation showing lack of support for 'indefinite' value; see http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=revision&revision=1310644

move to resolved+later
creator: gadams@apache.org
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition resolved+later to closed+later; if you have new information or a patch that addresses the issue, you may reopen
